title: Subjugation and Surrender
description: Francis, a small boy, is an indebted slave to the owner of Southport's two BDSM clubs, sold by his father to cover a debt.Aran is a large dominant werewolf of Cathal Clan, come to Southport to discover the wereabouts of his missing friend, Dillon.After a dispute with Francis's master, Aran finds himself at the mercy of the young boy, being publicly punished in the dungeon of Club Deference.Will pain and humiliation drive the feral werewolf to kill ... or love?
author: Tadgh Faolan
